column2: Pirates practice a unique system of succession, where the most able (and ruthless) capitan takes over. Unlike Feudal Electors, each elector has a different voting strength, based on his prestige, piety and attributes, making some electors more influential than others. The current ruler wields the most influence, unless disfigured, deformed or underage. Direct vassals of the ruler, close family members, Commanders, Councillors and Claimants are all viable candidates for succession
[Root.GetFirstName] has killed at least one man

From Vancouver to Guyana my name is spoken of in hushed whispers, my sails are known to all, and most importantly I have earned the respect of my fellow Brethren faitfhul. Perhaps the time has come to crown a new [Root.GetPirateMonarch]?

I have plundered the seas of the Americas for years - there is not a soul in the world that could possibly contest my right to rule as [Root.GetPirateMonarch], and yet it is not enough. When I at long last meet Davy Jones in his watery halls my Kingdom shall turn to ash... but perhaps the time has come to change that?

Since the first Brethren took to the seas they've told stories of the great Pirate Kings and Queens of old - From Blackbeard to Charles Vane and William Kidd and now [Root.GetFullName]. Through grit, bravery, and skill, [Root.GetFullName] has managed to proclaim [Root.GetHerselfHimself] the new [Root.GetPirateMonarch], ushring in a new era for the Brethren in the process.

Entire cities have been decimated by the raids of [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName], etching [This.Founder.GetHerHis] legacy as one of the most fearsome and ruthless Pirates of [This.Founder.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
column3: Des cités entières ont été décimées par les pillages [This.Founder.Get_du_TitledFirstName], gravant son nom dans le marbre en tant que l'un[This.Founder.Get_E] des pirates les plus redoutables et impitoyables [This.Founder.PrimaryTitle.Get_du_Realm].
column4: Ganze Städte wurden durch die Überfälle von [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName] niedergemäht, [This.Founder.Getderdie] sein Vermächtnis als eine[This.Founder.GetrMale] der furchterregendsten und rücksichtslosesten Piraten von [This.Founder.PrimaryTitle.GetName] beansprucht.
column6: Ciudades enteras fueron devastadas por las incursiones de [This.Founder.GetTitledFirstName], grabando su legado como uno de los piratas de [This.Founder.PrimaryTitle.GetName] más terribles y despiadados.

column2: The blood of famous Pirate courses through your veins. All along the coasts, villages tremble as they recall the stories of the fearsome [Root.Founder.GetBestName] - and now, it is time for you to carry on their legacy.

The blood of famous Viking courses through your veins. All along the coasts, villages tremble as they recall the stories of the fearsome [Root.Founder.GetBestName] - and now, it is time for you to carry on their legacy.

Ashes to ashes, dust to dust. It seems the [dead_pirate_king.GetPirateMonarch] [dead_pirate_king.GetFullName] has breathed [dead_pirate_king.GetHerHis] last and with that [dead_pirate_king.GetHerselfHimself] Kingdom has collapsed. But fear not, for in the chaos lays opportunity - opportunity for a new [Root.GetPirateMonarch] to rise.
Perhaps I shall be the one?

[From.GetFullName] has had a long and bountiful career as a Pirate, even managing to get [From.GetHerselfHimself] proclaimed [From.GetPirateMonarch], but that was simply not enough for the infamous [From.GetPirateMonarch]. [From.GetFullName], in a grand ceremony attended by all their subordinate Captains, has proclaimed that the title of [From.GetPirateMonarch] shall henceforth become hereditary and that their dynasty shall have the sole claim to the title of [From.GetPirateMonarch]. While many have scoffed at this outright ridiculous proclimation it's not as if they can do anything to stop [From.GetFullName].
I am the greatest Pirate that ever lived!
